channel.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
channel.description:
[b][i][COLOR='Red']E3 2010![/SIZE][/i][/b]
Yes, E3 is here and it's going to be around for a while! I made this thread so you can post all the announcements here instead of making a thread for every single game shown @ E3! :wink: Use it as a discussion thread as well what you think of the different games!
[b]Live:[/b] [i][url]https://e3.nintendo.com/[/url][/i] - Nintendo [url]https://e3.gamespot.com/press-conference/sony-e3/[/url] - Sony(Not the Official) [url]https://e3.gamespot.com/press-conference/?tag=content_nav;video;press-conferences?ttag=mktg_e32010_email2pressconferences[/url] -Microsoft [url]https://www.youtube.com/user/E3[/url] - IGNs coverage. [url]https://e3.gamespot.com/press-conference/ubisoft-e3/?tag=live;press-conf-list;ubisoft;title[/url] - Ubisoft [url]https://e3.gamespot.com/press-conference/ea-e3/?tag=live;press-conf-list;ea;title[/url] - Electronic Arts [url]https://www.gametrailers.com/e3/livefeed/microsoft[/url] - Microsoft! ______________________________________ [b][COLOR='Red']Reserved for VALVe[/b]
______________________________________ [b][i]Trailers/Information!:[/i][/b] [b]Star Wars: Force Unleashed 2[/b] - [url]https://www.gametrailers.com/video/e3-2010-the-force/101182[/url] [b]Project Natal/ Wave/ Kinect [/b]- [url]https://www.engadget.com/2010/06/13/microsoft-kinect-gets-official/[/url] [b]Killzone 3[/b] - [url]https://www.gametrailers.com/video/e3-2010-killzone-3/101188[/url] [b]Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood[/b] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ro4LKrm-30[/url]
[b]Miscellaneous:[/b]
[url]https://www.gametrailers.com/video/the-top-gt-countdown/64337[/url]
If you happen to know of any other simillar things, please post em!

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
item.dc:creator: SoaringScout
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Why is it that people either loved or hated Crysis. Virtually no one is in the middle.

I liked Crysis… it just lacked a nice story and the gameplay got boring after a while. Such as in awakening… I got really bored when I was clearing out that warehouse-like building.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
item.dc:creator: Picklesworth
item.description:
P-Thunder.:

Everyone wants to kill koreans!

And tear apart their shacks by head-butting them. I don’t see that happening either. The alien structures were disappointingly still after all those destructible buildings. New York will have a similar problem.

Read full topic

item.description:
I loved Crisis’ graphics. In fact i’m a graphic whore. Crisis is the only turkish language available game i played. And transtlations sucked. Seriously i was nearly killing myself. I am not even mentioning A.I. Story was not that bad methinks. I’m in the middle

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Why is it that people either loved or hated Crysis. Virtually no one is in the middle.

I’m more or less in the middle on Crysis Warhead (I haven’t played Crysis 1). It’s fun, but it’s not Half-Life.

My theory is most people hate it simply because it has such good graphics. First, their computer can’t play it on anything but the really ugly settings so that makes them not like it, and second, people have this idea that good graphics and good gameplay are mutually exclusive. They think that if a game has good graphics then that means the devs focused on graphics and threw gameplay out the door, which is obviously not true, but that doesn’t stop them.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I’m in the middle. It’s a decent, playable game, but nothing great. It could have used more optimization tho.

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
item.dc:creator: faelnor
item.description:
crysis had good gameplay as long as you played the delta difficulty level, and until you started fighting the aliens. Loved the infiltration and multi-approach aspect.

From the looks of it, Crysis 2 might be more scripted and linear and i don’t like it

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
item.dc:creator: SoaringScout
item.description:
saivert:

Hope the little of the story we have seen so far is only a taste and not all of it.
The story and gameplay in Crysis 1 sucked. That game was terrible. Just a graphics demo.

Agreed. If it was not intended to be a graphics demo… it would have had a much better story. It sounds similar to the story to Halo(only at the core level though).

Crysis: The protagonists drop onto a Korean island in search of an archeologist
Halo: The protagonists crash land on an unknown ring after being attacked
Crysis: Then they fight the bad guys who were already native to the island(Koreans
Halo: They too fight the bad guys who, once again, are also native to the ring
Crysis: A new army of aliens is discovered buried in the island
Halo: The Flood is released after being sealed away for such as long time

They’re very similar stories IMO.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
item.dc:creator: theriddlen
item.description:
I never understood the people who said that Crysis was poorly optimized. On maximal settings it needed (back when it was released) powerful computer, but i was able to play it on minimal with high FPS on 4 years old graphic card. And it still looked great.

The story and gameplay in Crysis 1 sucked. That game was terrible.

I loved the gameplay mechanics, it was wonderful. And story? Maybe it was not best one i’ve ever heard, but hell, this is game, story has to be epic and enjoyable - and Crysis completed this task.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!

item.description:
I played EP2 in oct 2007, and I played crysis around 2007 on my pentium 4, at 20FPS.

item.title: E3 2010 Announcements!
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
Crysis 2 also looks a lot more interesting even though it is basically just another shooter.

Hope the little of the story we have seen so far is only a taste and not all of it.
The story and gameplay in Crysis 1 sucked. That game was terrible. Just a graphics demo.

and yes, they were forced to optimize it really well now since they are running it on the consoles. Crysis 1 is a major drag.

Read full topic
